completeListOfAbilities.desc:
4-hit magic  PG attack +  PF attack
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Consumes 3 Ninki

While Bhavacakra equipped:
 â€¢ BRV Attackã€? HP Attack grant 1 Ninki
 â€¢ Jugulating Waspã€? Shadow Fang grant 2 Ninki
While Ninki at least 3:
 â€¢ BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Ninki)
 â€¢ Bhavacakra becomes Bhavacakra+
 (consumes 3 Ninki after use)
